text: Verburg is a Dutch toponymic surname. It is a contraction of "Van der Burg", meaning "from the fortress / stronghold".Verburg at the Database of Surnames in The Netherlands. Variants are Verborg, Verburch, Verburgh and Verburgt. Notable people with the surname include: *Adriaan Verburgh (died 1602), Dutch painter *David Verburg (born 1991), American sprinter *Dionys Verburg (1655–1722), Dutch landscape painter *Gerda Verburg (born 1957), Dutch diplomat, politician and trade union leader *JoAnn Verburg (born 1950), American photographer *Nicolaas Verburg (c.1620–1676), Dutch Governor of Formosa and Director General of the VOC council in Batavia ==References== Category:Dutch-language surnames Category:Toponymic surnames
title: Verburg
